snippet: The president’s executive order, if issued, would force any company that contracts with the federal government to issue paid leave to sick employees, potentially affecting hundreds of thousands of workers.
abstract: Pres Obama drafts executive order requiring companies contracted to federal government to allow paid leave for employees that are sick, in need of medical attention or caring for sick relative; is latest in string of executive orders seeking to improve conditions for employees of businesses working with government.
lead_paragraph: The president’s executive order, if issued, would force any company that contracts with the federal government to issue paid leave to sick employees, potentially affecting hundreds of thousands of workers.

headline.main: Obama Drafts Order on Paid Sick Leave for Federal Contractors
headline.print_headline: Obama Drafts Order on Paid Sick Leave for Contractors
